jobDescription: Job Description:Description: Job Purpose: This position is responsible for designing enhancements and new business applications and/or information systems solutions through integration of technical and business requirements; serving as technical designer to identify best solution and resulting technical specifications within limits of code environment; linking Business Analyst needs and Architect definition to technical solutions. Required Job Qualifications * Bachelor Degree and 4 years Information Technology OR Technical Certification and/or College Courses and 6 year Information Technology experience OR 8 years Information Technology experience. Experience with Data analysis: must look at the numbers, trends, and data and come to new conclusions based on the findings. * Experience developing/use of DB2 and Teredata databases to analyze and interpret results using standard tools and techniques * Strong SQL skills * Ability to present findings, or translate the data into an understandable document. * Mine data from primary and secondary sources * Clean and prune data to discard irrelevant information * Proactively seeking clarification of requirements and direction; take responsibility when needed; * Experience in producing System Data Requirements, Functional and non-functional requirements. * Experience in data mapping. * Knowledge of UNIX * Knowledge of application configuration * Knowledge of Big Data Analytics - HADOOP * Knowledge of Cloud computing / SaaS / IaaS / PaaS technologies * Knowledge of Integration Technologies - Talend/ Datastage * Knowledge of Scripting Languages - BASH / PERL / PYTHON / RUBY * Experience in Requirements definition & management * SDLC Methodology - Agile / Scrum / Iterative Development * System Performance management * Conceptual thinking * Creative thinking * Problem solving and analytical thinking * Ability to multi-task * Strong oral/written communication skills * Ability to change direction quickly based on data analysis * Enjoying discovering and solving problems * Being able to work in stressful situation when insights in (new) data sets is required quickly * Experience preparing presentations and communicating findings to internal and external customers. * Experience working with little supervision to consistently meet deadlines. Preferred Job Qualifications: * Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or Information Technology related * Ability to execute * Math Skills: Data analysts need math skills to estimate numerical data. * Experience in Data Quality and Data Audit and Controls. *CA *CB Location: IL - Chicago, TX - Richardson Activation Date: Tuesday, July 3, 2018 Expiration Date: Saturday, July 21, 2018
